name: NFCISO7816APDU
desc: An object representing an ISO 7816 application protocol data unit (APDU).

items.name: init(instructionClass: UInt8, instructionCode: UInt8, p1Parameter: UInt8, p2Parameter: UInt8, data: Data, expectedResponseLength: Int)
items.desc: Creates an APDU object with the instruction class and code, parameter bytes, and expected response length.

items.name: init?(data: Data)
items.desc: Creates an APDU object with the data buffer containing the full APDU.

items.name: var instructionClass: UInt8
items.desc: The value of the instruction class (CLA) byte.

items.name: var instructionCode: UInt8
items.desc: The value of the instruction code (INS) byte.

items.name: var p1Parameter: UInt8
items.desc: The value of the P1 parameter byte.

items.name: var p2Parameter: UInt8
items.desc: The value of the P2 parameter byte.

items.name: var expectedResponseLength: Int
items.desc: The expected response data length (Le) in bytes.
